text: avarkaḷ (koṭumaikkāra aracaṉ muṉṉilaiyil) eḻuntu niṉṟu"vāṉaṅkaḷukkum, pūmikkum iṟaivaṉākiya avaṉē, eṅkaḷuṭaiya iṟaivaṉ; ekkālattum avaṉaiyaṉṟi vēṟu evaraiyum nāyaṉeṉṟu aḻaikka māṭṭōm; (appaṭic ceytāl kuḥpril koṇṭu cērkkum) - varampu mīṟiyataic coṉṉavarkaḷ āvōm" eṉṟu avarkaḷ uṟutiyākak kūṟiya nilaiyil avarkaḷ itayaṅkaḷai nām valuppaṭuttiṉōm
